text:
Hi! I'm developing an app that will fetch all tickets associated with an account. I found this resource
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/beta-docs/reference/api/crm/objects/tickets/v1#get-all-tickets>
which suggests that I need to specify the properties I want for the returned tickets to contain.
Please help with the following:
1. Is this the case?
2. Where can I see a comprehensive list of ticket properties, from which to choose?
3. Is there a "Ticket Summary" property?
Thank You!!
